Articles.Content:
This is my first craft that i have put on the exchange. This is a Frigate/ small carrier. this isn't meant to fly in atmos so be wary. i used hyper edit to get it in space. once there it flies fine under 2/3 throttle with sas of full power with minor adjustments.This is my first post so if there is a lack of detail or other things missing just pm me and ill add them

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Here is the download

https://www.dropbox.com/s/r06jc8kpjc22pa8/Hermes%20supply%20frigate.craft?dl=0
